titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4737) to reauthorize and improve the program of block grants to States for temporary assistance for needy families, improve access to quality child care, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-466, by Ms. Pryce (OH).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 159.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 422.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 213 - 204 (Roll no. 165).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 205, 1 Present (Roll no. 166).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/15/2002--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 4737 (TANF reauthorization).
